pkgmetadata.longdescription: Lava Estimation for the Sum of Sparse and Dense Signals(3 Methods) // The lava estimation is used to recover signals that is the sum of a sparse signal and a dense signal. The post-lava method corrects the shrinkage bias of lava. For more information on the lava estimation, see Chernozhukov, Hansen, and Liao (2017) doi:10.1214/16-AOS1434.
